subject: docs(claude): add do-not-modify rule for ai-research-output-guide
body:
The AI research output guide is a user-facing document pasted into AI
assistant contexts. Changes to it require explicit approval. Added a
hard rule in the Documentation section of CLAUDE.md to prevent
unintentional modifications.

Tags: docs, claude-md, conventions
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: documentation
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GNAcWQsJLvaecBNw4ya2Xa
title: add do-not-modify rule for ai-research-output-guide
